wp:tag.wp:tag_name: Best Red Carpet Looks from Governors Awards

item.title: Home Food
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
WelcomeAnon RestaurantTry Something New and Taste the OldFood DeliveryGet served like a king and forget about doing the dishes.Food DeliveryGet served like a king and forget about doing the dishes.

Welcome to

Anon Restaurant

Anon is one of the oldest wine cellars in Bulgaria. It was established in 1901 under the name Gnodapes. In 2002, it became part of the French holding Belvedere, renamed Marie Brizard Wine and Spirits in 2015.

The vineyards are situated at the foothills of the Anon mountain range, among the villages of Elhovo, Gorno Botevo and Mogilovo, and amount to 375 ha. The Domain grows and works with traditional grape varieties such as Rubin and Mavrud, as well as popular foreign grapes such as Pinot Noir, Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Chardonnay, Regent.

Our History

Amazing Tasted

delicious food

Enjoy the Space

Anon Restaurant

Anon is one of the oldest wine cellars in Bulgaria. It was established in 1901 under the name Gnodapes. In 2002, it became part of the French holding Belvedere, renamed Marie Brizard Wine and Spirits in 2015.

The vineyards are situated at the foothills of the Anon mountain range, among the villages of Elhovo, Gorno Botevo and Mogilovo, and amount to 375 ha. The Domain grows and works with traditional grape varieties such as Rubin and Mavrud, as well as popular foreign grapes such as Pinot Noir, Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Chardonnay, Regent.

Our History

What Client Say

Testimonial

Anon it’s my favourite store evest thing it’s made with quality The clothes are really good and looks so expensive but they not really . Shoes , bags great as well.

Sofia D.Megana

My experience with Anon is absolutely positive. The themes are beautifully designed and well documented. Anon theme provides quick and competent support.

Lily Nash

Follow Us
